Reviews.Title: Amazing camera, bad extras...
Reviews.Author: Dikson Avila Rojas
Reviews.Content: The camera and lens are perfect, but for the rest that this kit includes is pure chinesse items that you can get easely and cheaper from other places, if you buy all this thigs alone each one, you will have a better price, cannon also offers this combos of camera and 2 lens.Camera: Is the best one you can get from the cheap SLR ones. I recomend it 100%

Reviews.Title: Cannon EOS T2i
Reviews.Author: J. McNeil "Nosedive"
Reviews.Content: This is our first step to a digital SLR.  We have an EOS Rebel G that we've had for a Long Time.  This camera is easy to use right out of the box...after you charge the battery that is.  It has a tremendous amount of possibilities, which I am sure we'll hardly scratch the surface.  The package came with a USB card reader that makes upload of pictures a snap.  The tripod is a nice addition also.  I have not even charged the spare battery that came with it...maybe one day this one will get low and need a charge. Battery life seems to be great.

Reviews.Title: Great bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Yadid
Reviews.Content: This is my first DSLR, so I did not know what I was buying. I read some reviews and decided on the Canon T2i. It was love at first sight. The camera is very easy to handle and to learn, the photos are amazing, the kit lenses I bought were very good for a beginner, and all the extras I got in the kit, were just what I needed. i think I made a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera and kit
Reviews.Author: Fraggle
Reviews.Content: I've had this kit for a few months now and I love it. I am very new to photography, never done it before outside of a hobby. I did my research for days and based on the reviews + opinions from others, the Cannon T2i was a great camera for newbies and experts alike. I have been exploring this camera and reading up on tutorials, and it is honestly amazing. Of course a great camera doesn't automatically mean you'll take amazing shots (simply pointing and shooting does not equal a great photo, you WILL have to work on it), but it really is an awesome camera. It might seem intimidating to a newbie, what with all the buttons and etc., but you'll have a lot of fun learning about it and the books including in this kit at great as well. I have gotten decent at this camera and have taken some amazing photos - now I've got friends and strangers offering me money to take their photos. This camera is amazing and I suggest buying the camera if nothing else.The rest of the stuff that come with this kit are great as well. I don't know what the other reviews meant by saying this stuff was 'cheap'; I have been rough handling everything that came with it for months and I've been in the woods during tornado weather (seriously) and everything is still going strong. The carrying case is very sturdy, I keep the camera inside the case and put it in the trunk of my car. I drive like a bat out of hell and yet my camera still remains safe within the case. My two year old son has grabbed it and thrown it on the floor; my camera is still fine, that's how good the case is.As for the tripod, it is VERY sturdy. I think those who said it broke don't understand how to open the latches and lock them properly - something my brother did and almost broke it. If you know what you're doing, it will not break. it is very sturdy. As I said, I've taken it to the woods more than once, during windy weather and it stayed perfectly still.The little extras are a awesome - I went through the first battery and couldn't use my charger out in the woods. Thankfully this kit came with a backup, and trust me, you will need it. The cleaning kit also has come in handy numerous times. The SD card case is also another godsend that you don't realize you need until you actually need it. This kit is effing awesome!This seller's shipping was uber fast. Took like 3 days. Would have reviewed sooner but felt like I needed to use this a while to get a good honest opinion.Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Complete Rip-off
Reviews.Author: Amateur181 "Amateur181"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera being compromised by a terrible accessory package and an unethical seller. There are many low price products out there that are a much better deal than this. Try picking up the pieces you want individually. You'll get much better bang for your buck.

Reviews.Title: canon digital T21 camera
Reviews.Author: auntyem
Reviews.Content: I just bought this camera and so far I love it.  I ordered the kit with several extras.  After reading other peoples reviews I was skeptical because some of them indicated the extras were cheap, but I received it and everything is very nice.  I would not say anything is cheaply made.  I have seen things of better quality, but then I have also seen the same items of much worse quality.  So I would say the extras were middle of the road.I am still learning the camera itself, but so far, so good.

Reviews.Title: Great Cam, CRAPPY kit!
Reviews.Author: 'Desse
Reviews.Content: I must say the order was delivered pronto, got it just intime to have my sis take it to Ja for New Years Day.The camera itself is excellent and the lens (18-55 / 75-300)are ok too.My beef is with the cheap substandard quality of the bag- thestraps broke after a couple weeks. The tripod was a mess as whileI was extending the legs for the 1st time one of the latch brokeas well.......... real disappointment! But I really do love theT2i so I guess that compensates for the crappy add-ons

Reviews.Title: Camera is amazing...Accessories are CHEAP and not as advertised!!
Reviews.Author: Shiva
Reviews.Content: The camera is exceptional but the accessories they put together are cheap and not as advertised. Do not be fooled by the picture!! The bag I received is nothing like the picture for example. It only has one buckle and it is so flimsy and soft that I would NEVER place my camera in it. I chose the bundle to save the time and money but learned a valuable lesson. Please buy the camera seperately and give some TLC to you accessories. Don't make the same mistake I did! I wanted to return it but you open your items when you receive it to inspect and enjoy...not conducive to the return policy and the hassle and cost of it. Don't do it...too expensive of a lesson to be learned!!

Reviews.Title: This Bundle package includes all that we need at a right price!!!
Reviews.Author: Ravie
Reviews.Content: This bundle is smartly designed to include all the attachments required for a DSLR and at the right price. This item is perfect if we are not so concerned on the brand of the bag or tripod. It comes with an extra battery which impressed me alot. When we are outdoors an extra battery helps us keep going. It includes a 16GB SD Card, which is enough to shoot a small movie or 4000+ pictures and a tripod fills you with everything we need. Coming to the camera, it is simply wonderful. Canon T2i has everything we need for a beginner to professional photography. ISO Setting of 6400 gives us ability to shoot at a very low light. It supports quite a high shutter speed. I tried upto 1/1600 holding in hand. This package comes with 2 lens - 18-55mm and 70-300mm. It's also not that heavy as other DSLRs' so that makes it comfortable to carry outdoors. Last but not least, the seller emailed me couple of times to make sure I received everything properly and the items are working fine. This pro-active checking gives us a comfort level that we usually miss on online purchases.Overall I am impressed with this package and recommend this product and seller on Amazon. Happy Photography!!!

Reviews.Title: The Tabitha Story
Reviews.Author: Poison Harley "Lauren"
Reviews.Content: After saving, searching and comparing deals, I decided to purchase this camera package. I was excited and couldn't wait to get it and start snapping away! Four days after I purchased the item, I received it. Checked over the extras, and saw that while they weren't the same as the photo, they'd do for now. It was a good start. Then I checked the camera (base) and noticed that 3 essential parts within the camera had come loose and I couldn't use it. This wasn't the sellers fault - it looked like either a manufacturers error or due to shipping it got knocked loose. When I saw that my brand new camera was broken, it was late afternoon on Friday, I emailed the seller (through Amazon). I heard back from them on Sunday (mail back & they'll send another) shipped the camera immediately back on Tuesday. (Monday was a holiday) The seller received it on Thursday and unbeknownst to me, the seller shipped back the new one over night. So I missed the package on Friday. FINALLY on Monday I received my brand new, perfectly working camera. Through the entire ordeal, the seller was very helpful and felt sorry for the broken merchandise. Can't tell you how much I appreciated that, since I was about to cry when I noticed it was broken.*Side note* The first camera I received I named it Tabitha (I've named all the cameras I've owned). When I received the 2nd, I named her Tabitha Two.... T2. :)Wish I knew this before I purchased:- The only thing I was disappointed in was the bag I received. The one in the picture has side pockets and the one I received had none. It was a lot smaller than expected and could barely fit the 2 lenses & the camera, plus a couple extra little things. Would've liked a better description of exactly what I was getting, and not be fooled by the photo provided.Other than that, I was very happy with my purchase and the seller's help during the ordeal.

Reviews.Title: Not at all a great deal........
Reviews.Author: Vishalg
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't elaborate it a lot, just would like to say BUY things separately not in kit. I saved 150$ still got all the stuff that are mentioned over here.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, bad cheap Chinese accessories
Reviews.Author: M. V. FH "M.V.F."
Reviews.Content: The camera is exceptional but the accessories they put together are cheap and not as advertised, they are really cheap Chinese accessories. Do not be fooled by the picture!! The bag I received is nothing like the picture for example. It only has one buckle and it is so flimsy and soft that I would NEVER recomend place your camera in it. I chose the bundle to save the time and money but learned a valuable lesson. Please buy the camera seperately and give some TLC to you accessories. Don't make the same mistake I did! I wanted to return it but you open your items when you receive it to inspect and enjoy...not conducive to the return policy and the hassle and cost of it. Don't do it...too expensive of a lesson to be learned!!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T2i Camera Kit
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: The Canon EOS Rebel T2i Camera Kit as sold by Celltime in Brooklyn, NY is a wonderful deal and an amazing camera.  For a non Camera geek it does not get any better than this.  Just a little review of the instructions and some test photos and you are immediately getting incredible results in stills and video .  Super!!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: R. Manwell "lightninrod"
Reviews.Content: Very nice, light weight camera with excellent features.  Why then did I give it four stars and not five?  Kit lens is not up to quality of the camera, save your money and get a 17-85IS USM lens and you will be happier.  My package was missing the free game DVDs and the guide to digital SLR cameras.  The company that sent my package was different from the one listed by Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera
Reviews.Author: smnthyg
Reviews.Content: I forgot to write this review sooner. Didn't know how to till now. hahahahaha... Finally figured out how to write reviews. Any ways, great camera! Love the camera. The only thing was, when we got our tripod, there was something wrong with the tripod. Wasn't standing up like it should. We had to use tape. Sadden. But the camera itself works well.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: K. Hughes "K. Hughes"
Reviews.Content: I love this Camera. My mom has this camera so I was familiar with it before purchasing it. It was a lot cheaper than the T3i at the time of purchase with not a lot of difference, so I went ahead and got this one. All of the accessories are a nice bonus. I had a 4 month old when I got it and was a realtor, so it serves multiple purposes. My husband is a bird lover, so it gets a lot of use photographing birds. Probably more so than anything else right now. Overall, it is a great camera. Especially if you are just starting out. He uses the 75-300mm lens almost always for birding. It is an inexpensive body and starter kit, that you can add more expensive higher quality lenses to and be very happy with.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Gregory S-S
Reviews.Content: Got this about a year ago for a friend who was taking a photography course. She has since graduated and does freelance work and from what she says and judging from her workload the camera is more than doing its fair share in getting her jobs.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Tracy L Rozier
Reviews.Content: we love this camera great buy, I brought this camera for me and my 23 year old son has took it.  he loves it.

Reviews.Title: $800 for broken stuff
Reviews.Author: Tom Tourek
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife. She has always had an interest in photography and the T2i was the choice to get her started. We were disappointed to pay over $800 for a camera that was broken upon receipt. Worst of all is that this was a new camera.

Reviews.Title: Now taking great pictures
Reviews.Author: T. Byrne
Reviews.Content: Good starter camera for advanced photography. I bought it with a kit of included products. Great value. I recommend taking a photography class if you buy one.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: StaceyB
Reviews.Content: Everything you need to start taking some amazing pictures.  The only thing not included is the flash and flash accessories.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: W J Smith
Reviews.Content: Great package deal! Ideal for the beginner' I've taken some really great photos with this camera since I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Rebel T21 Bundle
Reviews.Author: Janet Stone
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing!!  I'm by far no professional photog, but I recommend this camera to anyone looking to get a DSLR camera.  It is easy to use, and has more features and settings than most people will ever use.  This bundle included so many great things--the tripod, bag, card, lens, battery.....you name it, it was included.  The Canon camera line cannot be beat!  I know that I'm going to use this camera for years to come, and having all the accessories I needed come with it was such a bonus!  Glad I ordered from Amazon....the camera body and simple lens were nearly this price at other electronics stores.

Reviews.Title: good choice
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: since now there is already T4i as I saw. But I just love my camera, and, honestly, udes all tools in set, including users guide, lol

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: manda
Reviews.Content: This product has all you need to get started with the camera. The camera is very nice and has tons of settings to create amazing pictures. Most of the accessories you can get piece by piece if you do not want to get the bundle but I find this bundle is the best deal.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T2i
Reviews.Author: woodrow
Reviews.Content: Purchased this set for my son who was just getting into photography.  He loves the camera and it takes terrific pictures.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: cynthia weir
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this camera. It is a good investment,if u enjoy photograpjy. I would highly recommend this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awesome I love it
Reviews.Author: Reza
Reviews.Content: When i open the Box I was Happy to see the Stuff.....it was beyond my Expectation, Camera was Really Good (Made in Japan), Both Lens are working Good, Tripod and Other Stuff was good also.Every things will come in this price, I love it.If any one plans to buy it, I recommend them go for it you will definitely enjoy.regards/ Kashif Reza

Reviews.Title: I love my canon
Reviews.Author: Vikicupcake
Reviews.Content: This camera is everything promised to be. It is an amazing camera and a wonderful price. Nowhere is there a better deal.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: rachrave
Reviews.Content: We love this package. It's true that the small items included in the package (lens cleaning kit, card reader, etc.) are not brand name things, the overall value for the camera, lens, camera bag and tripod can't be beat. When we read the reviews, we were prepared to be disappointed by the camera bag and tripod, but they're exactly what we need and we couldn't be happier with this purchase.I can't vouch for the DSLR Intro DVD because I have no intention of watching it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, although accessories that came with it are defective.
Reviews.Author: ericnera
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  Had a chance to use it in fully auto mode and got some great pics.  Looking forward to studying photography to maximize the features of this camera.One thing though that disappointed me.  The free tripod that came with it had defective locks.  The plastic locks were already brittle and had cracks so I am unable to use it.  In the cleaning set that came with it, the cleaning solution was empty.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied and still learning
Reviews.Author: LC
Reviews.Content: I purchased Canon T2i as my first D-SLR in August 2011. I always wanted a camera that would make 'professional' pictures, but the better ones have always been pretty pricey. I haven't paid much attention to a research of other brands, but i knew i wanted Canon, since my 2 previous digital cameras were Canon and i have always been pleased with the quality of the picture as well as the camera itself.As a newbie to DSLR, i didn't plan on spending more than 1,000 USD, and i wanted it to come as a kit, to have the basics taken care of already. Initially I was deciding between lower categories of Canon Rebel EOS up to T3i. I wanted 12+ MPix, possibly a HD video shooting, face detection, anti-shake, and at least 2 frames/sec...you know, those basic features you are thinking about when buying a DSLR.Photography has always been my passion, taking pictures on every day basis, at school, around town, on trips. But when i decided to give my photos additional dimension, depict the natural beauty, DSLR was the choice to make, asap.So i decided to go with the T2i, (being sold in Europe as EOS 550). T3i has the flip open LCD screen, which i regarded rather as a downside, since i didnt see it too practical after some usage. (i was worried the screen wont hold in place, would open by itself or might get damaged faster than the regular screen). Going to a higher levels: such as 5D or even 7D was inviting, but out of my price range for a newbie.I am no pro, i have owned this camera for over 8 months now, but i still haven't been able to try out all the features.The camera is amazing, takes great photos, and it is pretty sturdy in my hands. Pictures are 1000x better than the ones taken with the regular point and shoot camera. The most importantly, it gives general photography advanced look.When i get a little more familiar with my new toy (and save up some money), i will definitely invest into Macro lens, as i have always been interested in details.What i dislike is the camera bag that my kit included, i only use it to store my camera in when at home, i dont take it outside, as it is bulky and not very practical to carry around.Battery stays charged for a long time, and 16GBit is more than enough. Otherwise, when going on a vacation or a longer trip, i always bring my laptop, so i transfer photos immediately, and never run out of memory.I strongly recommend this camera, Canon never let me down :)

Reviews.Title: Love the Camera, Lenses and extras!
Reviews.Author: Donna Rae Caporaso
Reviews.Content: No complaints.  Great deal.  Great communication and quick shipping.  Tripod is light weight and good for indoor use but I don't use one often so that's no big deal.  Battery life on both batteries superb!

Reviews.Title: Love my new camera
Reviews.Author: Rapunz Elle
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for about two weeks and I love it.  It takes great pictures.  I have a two year old that is on the go and it definitely captures his moments!  After I found out Nikon's policy on repairs it made my decision to move to the Canon an easy one.  I thought it was reasonably priced and I was happy to find a bundle.  And in the bundle I thought everything was great, with the exception of the tripod.  It wasn't so much the legs of it, I just couldn't get the part that attaches to the camera to stay level.  But really I didn't buy the bundle because it had a tripod.  Other than that I'm extremely happy with this camera/bundle!

Reviews.Title: Easy for Beginners
Reviews.Author: MissDonna003
Reviews.Content: Easy for beginners, great photo quality, good purchase for the money. I would recommend this camera to others. Purchase arrived quickly and tracking information was accurately depicted.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Nadine
Reviews.Content: camera is great, lenses are great, tripod is good for me. little tiny tabletop tripod is horrible but it's so cute haha i'll never actually use it though. the screen protectors that come with this are horrible and i took mine right off once i put it on. i used one from my cell phone instead. the bag is just alright. nothing special. holds what you need but nothing great. overall, i love the camera and the bag comes in handy and the tripod is good for my use and i just love it all together. it's perfect.

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal
Reviews.Author: Dizzy
Reviews.Content: B-E-A-U-T-I-F-U-L!!! I absolutely love this camera. It is my first digital SLR, and the first time I've used a SLR since the film rebel from photography class.  It has seriously rekindled a passion of mine that has been lying dormant for the past 10 years... All the extra accessories were worth the price,

Reviews.Title: Received as advertised
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: Package arrived well packed and included all items advertised. I think I saved about $50 - $60 buying from this retailer vs buying a similar package at Costco... Go ahead and buy with confidence.

Reviews.Title: Exelent
Reviews.Author: gda91510
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my son who is in college and needed a cdamare for on of his assigments, he is very please with the camera pqackege i bought for him.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Zandolig
Reviews.Content: Everything was ok. Thanks for your responsability. All you said was true. Rapid expedition. Satisfaction guaranteed. I'm very agree to make business with you

Reviews.Title: Camera is excellent, accessories are not
Reviews.Author: 03ephatch
Reviews.Content: Canon cameras are well known in the world of photography, so when I received my camera and its lenses it didn't fall short of my expectations. But I can otherwise say differently about the camera bag (which is about to snap its handle, so I now have the legitimate canon backpack), the tripod (which is poorly constructed), and the lens cleaning kit (with fibers that come off the rag).

Reviews.Title: Canin T2i
Reviews.Author: Tracey Sammons
Reviews.Content: I gave this as a gift.  It was very well recieved.  I will say it was shipped promptly and with out any damage.  I have nothing but good experence with amazon and will continue to shop with them.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Dawn M. Brown
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent package! I'm so glad I ordered this. I was injured in 2002 and my hands tremble and my balance is off since the injury and my love of photography was stopped because all my pictures were blurry. The image stabilizer interested me and what a difference!! My pictures are clear and beautiful again!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing camera but bad accessories
Reviews.Author: Kalyan
Reviews.Content: This camera is one of the best. The price is comparatively cheaper. I loved the camera. Yes, I have concern on the accessories got with it; most of the accessories were china products and were very cheap. I suggest buy the accessories separately.

Reviews.Title: Wheres my Stuff
Reviews.Author: william M. Corson
Reviews.Content: So my wife ordered this and only recieved a camera, called Beach Camera and they said the add is wrong and it doesnt come with everything and that Amazoned messed up. GREAT to see that everyone else got everything even if its cheap. Hopefully Amazon can rectify it with the A-Z investigation

Reviews.Title: Great Value for Money
Reviews.Author: Dabir Ali Ansari
Reviews.Content: Hi,I had been thinking of buying an SLR camera for a long time and a friend suggested that I go through the deals available on Amazon.com. And thats how I bought this kit. This is my first SLR camera and I must say its superb value for money. Its got everything you need to get started and shoot like a pro.I got all my stuff in top condition. The camera is good, the two lenses are spot on. And the accessories are a plus.I would strongly recommend this to all photography enthusiasts out there.Cheers,Dabir

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T2i Kit
Reviews.Author: Jack Sparke
Reviews.Content: Bought the Canon EOS Rebel T2i EOS 550D with the kit as advertised.  It was as pictured and complete.  Excellent service from Ace Photo Digital.  Thank you very much,  Jack Saratogadriver@yahoo.com

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY
Reviews.Author: ROBET HIGASHI
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT THIS CAMERA FOR MY UPCOMING TRIP TO TANZANIA AND KENYA. I WANTED ONE THAT GIVES ME ALL THE BELLS AND WHISTLES. I AM STILL LEARNING HOW TO USE IT AND FIND THAT IT HAS ALL THE FEATURES I WANTED. I AM LOOKING FORWARD TO GETTING MANY OUTSTANDING PHOTOS. I REALLY LIKE THE CAMERA!

Reviews.Title: Great camera and lenses
Reviews.Author: whiznit
Reviews.Content: Camera and both lenses along with the bag are great. All the other items especially the tripod are a bit cheap. Everything is still worth it for the price! We love our new camera!

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Anju Chowdhary
Reviews.Content: The item came on time and it was in good condition. The packaging was great. We are anjoying our SLR camera. Thankyou.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Gibbius Maximus
Reviews.Content: Came with everything shown. Highly recommended for any skill level photographer, this camera is incredible. The video is also a lot of fun and worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: Euphoria has been met
Reviews.Author: Squirrel
Reviews.Content: The price of this package was impecable for what all was recieved. It was shipped faster than expected with no complications. It all seemed to good to be true. Then when I opened the box, the good just kept on. Everything was in perfect condition and working fine. I am beyond happy with this purchase. Couldnt have found a better deal!

Reviews.Title: My First SLR
Reviews.Author: Baba
Reviews.Content: It was hard getting away from Sony - I have been a Sony camcorder person for so long recording children growing up and capturing their activities for so many years.  Decided to try SLR and settled on Cannon Rebel T2i with 18MP, the main reason why gave up on camcorder and went to SLR, the huge mega pixels with video option.  I love the camera.  But there is one draw back.  Fond myself changing the lens so often that it became such a burden on the trip to Las Vegas/Hoover Dam.  With Sony HDR-SR12's powerful zoom, I could capture any surroundings without any hustle.  If not for 10.2 MP on still photos, I would have stayed with the camcorder.Right now I am looking to purchase a small pocket size camera with great zoom to carry along with my T2i to compensate this problem.  Found one with 14MP - not bad.  Will see how the video comes out - have not had time to go over them yet.

Reviews.Title: Camera review
Reviews.Author: Glentra
Reviews.Content: This package is a gift for Christmas for my wife. It arrived within 10days of purchase which was outstanding. I am looking forward to seeing photo's plastered over our walls of the great sites we visit. Thanks for a great transaction.

Reviews.Title: best camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Ahlan`
Reviews.Content: This camera is the best entry level camera in the market soo far. I been using it for a month now and i can tell you that i enjoy using it.

Reviews.Title: First DSLR
Reviews.Author: anmiho
Reviews.Content: I have always loved photography, and this was an investment for me to pursue my passion.Easy to use once you have read the instructions, and play with the lens settings a little bit so that you can familiarize yourself.I was able to take very good shots of a graduation ceremony, moving and far away objects to document my vacation, and even a baby's quiet moments.I absolutely love it. The fact that I have the tripod and mini tripod helps. I am yet to purchase more accessories, but as for now, no disappointments.Its worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an SLR as a gift for my wife. After shopping around for a week I finally settled on the Canon T2i. Thi sis a great camera. Easy to use, and very functional. The kit that I found on Amazon was amazing. It literally had everything you need to get started. Do yourself a favor and skip the local electronics store. Buy a bundle at Amazon, you'll end up saving hundreds of dollars. FOur stars because it still cost a lot, but then again, you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: My First SLR....
Reviews.Author: chsus
Reviews.Content: I am still exploring the camera.. but it is so much better than the point-and-shoots. I have had about four different types of point and shoot cameras, including basic and really functional ones but none of them even come close to this one. And I am saying this just after a month of owning it. It is expensive but I guess the price range is appropriate for DSLRs across the range. But please do note that this is not a plug and play kind of a camera, it does have a learning curve upfront (about 2-3 days for me).

Reviews.Title: Warranty
Reviews.Author: Naser Khalil
Reviews.Content: Could you please infom me about the Canon T2i Camera warranty?is it international warranty or not?And if i want it international warranty is there any extra charges?BR,Naser Khalil
